name: Lumos Networks Corp.
description: Lumos Networks Corp. is a telecommunications company based in the United States, specializing in providing high-speed fiber optic internet services, data center solutions, and other advanced communication services. Founded in 2014, Lumos has quickly established itself as a key player in the fiber broadband market, focusing on serving residential, business, and enterprise customers across its extensive network. The company operates a robust fiber network that spans over 9,000 route miles, delivering reliable and scalable connectivity solutions to meet the growing demands of digital communication. Lumos is committed to enhancing the customer experience by offering a range of products, including internet access, voice services, and managed network services. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, Lumos Networks aims to empower communities and businesses by providing them with the essential tools needed for digital transformation. The company is dedicated to bridging the digital divide and ensuring that even underserved areas have access to high-speed internet. Lumos Networks continues to explore opportunities for expansion and partnerships to enhance its service offerings and reach more customers, positioning itself as a leader in the telecommunications sector.

seo.meta_title: Lumos Networks Corp. | High-Speed Fiber Internet & Telecommunications
seo.meta_description: Explore Lumos Networks Corp., a leader in high-speed fiber internet and telecommunications services. Discover innovative solutions for residential and business needs.

faq.question: What services does Lumos Networks offer?
faq.answer: Lumos Networks offers high-speed fiber internet, data center solutions, and voice services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Lumos Networks?
faq.answer: Colleen A. McGarry is the CEO of Lumos Networks Corp.

faq.question: Where is Lumos Networks headquartered?
faq.answer: Lumos Networks is headquartered in Waynesboro, Virginia, USA.
